name: Asset Sensor
description: Monitors an asset for materializations and triggers a job when the asset is updated

asset_key.label: Asset Key
asset_key.description: Asset key to monitor (e.g., 'my_asset' or 'path/to/asset'). Can reference assets in other Dagster projects.

job_name.label: Job to Trigger
job_name.description: The job to run when the asset is materialized

description.label: Description
description.description: Description of what this sensor does
description.placeholder: Triggers downstream processing when upstream asset is updated

minimum_interval_seconds.label: Check Interval (seconds)
minimum_interval_seconds.description: How often to check for asset materializations

default_status.label: Default Status
default_status.description: Whether the sensor starts running or stopped
